item.title: Inventory-X: Messages
item.description: Messages used in the Inventory-X API <a href="/inventory-x/api-reference/messages/set-up/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-cog"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Set Up Messages</h3> <p>Configuration messages</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/api-reference/messages/product-load/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-upload"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Product Load Messages</h3> <p>Messages to load product</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/api-reference/messages/booking-flow/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-bed"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Booking Flow Messages</h3> <p>Booking Flow Messages</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/api-reference/messages/messages-ota-xsd/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-exchange"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Messages with OTA XSD structure</h3> <p>List of messages with OTA xsd structure used</p> </div> </div> </a>

item.title: Inventory-X: Code List
item.description: List of Codes used in the Inventory-X API <a href="/inventory-x/api-reference/codelist/setup-product-load-errors/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-bug"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Error Codes Set-up and Product load</h3> <p>List of Error Codes in Set-up and Product load</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/api-reference/codelist/booking-flow-errors/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-bug"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Error Codes Booking Flow</h3> <p>List of Error Codes in Booking Flow</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/api-reference/codelist/meal-plan-codes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-coffee"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Meal Plan Codes (OTA MPT)</h3> <p>List of Meal Plan Codes</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/api-reference/codelist/payment-type-codes/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-tag"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Payment Type Codes</h3> <p>List of Payment Type Codes</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/api-reference/codelist/credit-cards/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-credit-card"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Credit Cards Codes</h3> <p>List of Credit Cards Codes</p> </div> </div> </a>
